directions: Combine Brussels sprouts, mushrooms, olive oil, thyme leaves, mustard, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Stir until evenly combined.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add Brussels sprouts and cook for 4 minutes. Stir and cook for 4 minutes more. Increase heat to high and cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes more.
title: Pan-Fried Brussels Sprouts and Mushrooms with Thyme | Allrecipes
